exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.explanation: Start on your hands and knees. Inhale as you arch your back, and exhale as you round it.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.explanation: Kneel on the floor, sit back on your heels, and stretch your arms forward, lowering your head to the floor.

exercises.name: Pelvic Tilts
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Flatten your back against the floor by tightening your abdominal muscles and tilting your pelvis up slightly.

exercises.name: Bridge Exercise
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift your hips towards the ceiling while squeezing your glutes.

exercises.name: Lower Back Twist
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat. Drop your knees to one side while keeping your shoulders on the floor, then switch sides.

exercises.name: Neck Stretches
exercises.explanation: Gently tilt your head towards your shoulder and hold. Repeat on the other side.

exercises.name: Shoulder Shrugs
exercises.explanation: Lift your shoulders up towards your ears and then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Chin Tucks
exercises.explanation: Pull your chin towards your neck, creating a 'double chin' effect.

exercises.name: Upper Trapezius Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit or stand with your back straight. Tilt your head to one side and use your hand to gently pull your head further to the side.

exercises.name: Levator Scapulae Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit or stand. Rotate your head 45 degrees to one side and tilt your chin down towards your armpit. Use your hand to gently pull your head further.

exercises.name: Cross-Body Shoulder Stretch
exercises.explanation: Bring one arm across your body and use your other arm to pull it closer.

exercises.name: Doorway Stretch
exercises.explanation: Stand in a doorway, place your arms on the doorframe, and lean forward to stretch your chest and shoulders.

exercises.name: Overhead Stretch
exercises.explanation: Raise one arm overhead and bend your elbow. Use your other hand to gently pull your elbow towards your head.

exercises.name: Pendulum Stretch
exercises.explanation: Lean forward and let your arm hang down. Swing your arm gently in small circles.

exercises.name: Sleeper Stretch
exercises.explanation: Lie on your side with your bottom arm extended in front of you. Use your top arm to gently push your bottom arm down towards the floor.

exercises.name: Quadriceps Stretch
exercises.explanation: Stand on one leg, bend your other knee, and pull your heel towards your buttocks.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with one leg extended and the other bent. Reach towards your toes on the extended leg.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.explanation: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Lift your heels off the ground and then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Straight Leg Raises
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with one leg bent and the other straight. Lift the straight leg to the height of the bent knee.

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.explanation: Step onto a platform with one foot and then step back down. Repeat with the other foot.

exercises.name: Ankle Circles
exercises.explanation: Sit or lie down with one leg extended. Rotate your ankle in circles.

exercises.name: Calf Stretch
exercises.explanation: Stand facing a wall with one foot forward and one back. Press your back heel into the ground.

exercises.name: Heel Raises
exercises.explanation: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Lift your heels off the ground and lower them back down.

exercises.name: Towel Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with your legs extended. Loop a towel around your foot and gently pull towards you.

exercises.name: Ankle Dorsiflexion
exercises.explanation: Sit with your legs extended. Flex your foot upwards towards your shin.

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Kneel on one knee and push your hips forward to stretch the front of your hip.

exercises.name: Piriformis Stretch
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with one leg bent. Cross your other leg over the bent knee and pull your knee towards your chest.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift your hips towards the ceiling.

exercises.name: Hip Rotations
exercises.explanation: Sit on a chair and rotate your hip by moving your knee out to the side and back in.

exercises.name: Clamshell Exercise
exercises.explanation: Lie on your side with your knees bent. Keep your feet together and lift your top knee.

exercises.name: Wrist Flexor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your arm with your palm facing up. Use your other hand to gently pull your fingers down.

exercises.name: Wrist Extensor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your arm with your palm facing down. Use your other hand to gently pull your fingers down.

exercises.name: Finger Stretches
exercises.explanation: Extend your fingers and then make a fist. Repeat.

exercises.name: Tendon Glides
exercises.explanation: Extend your fingers straight, then bend your fingertips to touch the base of your fingers.

exercises.name: Wrist Curls
exercises.explanation: Hold a light weight in your hand with your palm facing up. Curl your wrist up and down.

exercises.name: Wrist Flexor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your arm with your palm facing up. Use your other hand to gently pull your fingers down.

exercises.name: Wrist Extensor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your arm with your palm facing down. Use your other hand to gently pull your fingers down.

exercises.name: Triceps Stretch
exercises.explanation: Raise one arm overhead and bend your elbow. Use your other hand to gently pull your elbow towards your head.

exercises.name: Bicep Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your arm with your palm facing up. Use your other hand to gently push your fingers back.

exercises.name: Forearm Pronation/Supination
exercises.explanation: Hold your forearm out and rotate your palm up and down.

exercises.name: Thoracic Extension
exercises.explanation: Sit on a chair and place a rolled towel or foam roller behind your mid-back. Lean back over it to extend your thoracic spine.

exercises.name: Scapular Squeeze
exercises.explanation: Squeeze your shoulder blades together and hold for a few seconds.

exercises.name: Child's Pose with Side Stretch
exercises.explanation: Kneel on the floor and sit back on your heels. Stretch your arms to one side, then the other.

exercises.name: Foam Roller Stretch
exercises.explanation: Lie on a foam roller placed along your spine. Stretch your arms out to the sides and hold.

exercises.name: Wall Angels
exercises.explanation: Stand with your back against a wall and arms at your sides. Raise your arms to form a 'W', then extend them overhead to form a 'Y'.

exercises.name: Calf Stretch
exercises.explanation: Stand facing a wall with one foot forward and one back. Press your back heel into the ground.

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.explanation: Sit on a chair with your feet flat. Raise your heels off the ground and lower them back down.

exercises.name: Standing Toe Raise
exercises.explanation: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Raise your toes off the ground and lower them back down.

exercises.name: Ankle Pumps
exercises.explanation: Sit with your legs extended. Flex and point your toes repeatedly.

exercises.name: Toe Curls
exercises.explanation: Sit with your feet flat on the ground. Curl your toes inwards and then extend them.

exercises.name: Plantar Fascia Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with one leg crossed over the other. Pull your toes back towards your shin.

exercises.name: Toe Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with your feet flat on the ground. Spread your toes apart and hold.

exercises.name: Marble Pickups
exercises.explanation: Place marbles on the ground and use your toes to pick them up.

exercises.name: Arch Raises
exercises.explanation: Sit with your feet flat. Raise the arches of your feet without lifting your toes or heels.

exercises.name: Towel Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with your legs extended. Loop a towel around your foot and gently pull towards you.

exercises.name: Finger Flexor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your arm with your palm facing up. Use your other hand to gently pull your fingers down.

exercises.name: Finger Extensor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your arm with your palm facing down. Use your other hand to gently pull your fingers down.

exercises.name: Thumb Stretch
exercises.explanation: Extend your thumb and use your other hand to gently pull it back.

exercises.name: Grip Strengthening
exercises.explanation: Squeeze a soft ball or stress ball repeatedly.

exercises.name: Finger Taps
exercises.explanation: Tap each finger to your thumb repeatedly.

exercises.name: Pelvic Tilts
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Flatten your back against the floor by tightening your abdominal muscles and tilting your pelvis up slightly.

exercises.name: Abdominal Bracing
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Tighten your abdominal muscles as if bracing for a punch.

exercises.name: Heel Slides
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Slide one heel out straight, then return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your arms extended towards the ceiling. Lower one arm and the opposite leg towards the floor while keeping your back flat.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.explanation: Start on your hands and knees. Extend one arm and the opposite leg out straight, then switch sides.

exercises.name: Adductor Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with your legs extended. Bring the soles of your feet together and gently push your knees towards the floor.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with your feet together and knees out to the sides. Hold your feet and gently press your knees towards the floor.

exercises.name: Standing Groin Stretch
exercises.explanation: Stand with your feet wide apart. Shift your weight to one side, bending your knee, and keep the other leg straight.

exercises.name: Lying Groin Stretch
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your feet together and knees out to the sides. Gently press your knees towards the floor.

exercises.name: Side Lunge
exercises.explanation: Stand with your feet wide apart. Bend one knee and lower your body towards that side, keeping your other leg straight.

exercises.name: Standing Quad Stretch
exercises.explanation: Stand on one leg, bend your other knee, and pull your heel towards your buttocks.

exercises.name: Lying Quad Stretch
exercises.explanation: Lie on your side with one leg bent. Grab your ankle and pull your heel towards your buttocks.

exercises.name: Quad Sets
exercises.explanation: Sit with your legs extended. Tighten your thigh muscles and press the back of your knee into the floor.

exercises.name: Straight Leg Raise
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with one leg bent and the other straight. Lift the straight leg to the height of the bent knee.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.explanation: Stand with your back against a wall and slide down into a seated position, holding for as long as possible.

exercises.name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
exercises.explanation: Sit with one leg extended and the other bent. Reach towards your toes on the extended leg.

exercises.name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
exercises.explanation: Stand with one leg slightly in front of the other. Bend at the hips and reach towards your toes.

exercises.name: Hamstring Curls
exercises.explanation: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Bend one knee and bring your heel towards your buttocks.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Deadlift
exercises.explanation: Stand on one leg, bend at the hips, and extend the other leg behind you. Lower your torso towards the floor.

exercises.name: Bridge Exercise
exercises.explanation: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift your hips towards the ceiling while squeezing your glutes.
